Text: Eta, pass me that orange.
...No, I don't wanna move.
Don't say that. You're the closest.

My arms will get cold if they leave the heated
table... I'm curled up inside, like Zeta.

Mitsugoshi's heated tables are amazing... You can't
get out once you're in... *flop*

*sigh*... It's a new year but everyone is completely
knocked out.

Alpha, being lazy during the New Year holiday is a
time-honored tradition where I grew up.

Those rules belong there. Here we have our own rules.
If you're all going to be pigs, then I will put away the
heated table.
Noooo, it's too soon!
Alpha, you demon! Fiend! Elf!

Yes, I'm an elf. What's wrong with elves? Come on,
follow Delta's example.
Yay!
Woow!!
Hahahaha!!!

How can she be so worked up in this cold? Stupid dogs
sure are stupid...

If we follow her example...the brains of the Shadow
Garden will rot... It will be a loss to the world.
Indeed, dogs will play, and children will laugh.

Oh, I've never heard that idiom before. Is it Shadow
Wisdom?
Um, kinda...

(Through Mitsugoshi, my knowledge of my past life that
I've taught Gamma and the girls is spreading throughout
this world.)

(Thanks to that, I can have a satisfying laze around
on New Year's just like in modern Japan. Although
speaking of New Year culture...)
Don't they make kagami rice cakes around here?
Kagami rice cakes? What are those?

Kagami rice cakes. They're made from rice, they're
round, white, and hard...

That's too vague. I can't imagine it. I might be able
to guess if I had your insight...

I know about rice cakes. Some therianathropes make
them by cooking warm rice. But aren't rice cakes
supposed to be soft?

That's one kind of rice cake... In other words,
kagami rice cakes change shape according to
the circumstances?

It's food, but it changes shape...? Isn't that slime?
Sounds interesting, but not delicious.

Alpha has certainly got the right idea, but...yeah,
it's hard to explain. I think you'd understand if
you see it.

Hey Eta, can't you research it and make some rice
cakes to put out for decoration?

Processed like a paste... That's common... Not
interesting.

It isn't a paste but a special rice cake with a
malleable shape, right, Cid?
Umm... I guess it's difficult to reproduce.

But we went to the trouble to have New Year's, so I
wanted to do something New Year-related.

If you want to eat it, then I will manage somehow to
find this kagami rice cake.

Really? It's probably unimportant around here, so
don't go overboard searching for it, okay?

If I can't even find kagami rice cakes, then I can't
be the leader of the Seven Shadows.

Look, Cid, this is a good chance to really prove our
strength.

(Did I hit an unnecessary switch? Well, anyway...this
could get interesting.)

No one here seems to know anything about it. Let me
ask the others.

No, Master Shadow hasn't blessed me with such special
wisdom.
We don't sell any food at Mitsugoshi with such a name.

I have access to various cakes in my position, but I've
never heard of those kind of cakes.
No good. I've tried everyone.

But I made such a big deal about it, so I can't
exactly go ask Cid now...

Ha-ruff. What's up Lady Alpha? You lookin' for kagami
rice cakes?

I don't think you know about them, Delta. Now where
can I find kagami rice cakes...
Yeah, I know about 'em.

Exactly, it was a waste of time asking you―wait,
what?!!

This may be the first time I've seen Lady Alpha so
surprised...
Delta, do you really know about kagami rice cakes?

Yes. It's a rice cake recipe that has been passed
down in therianathrope villages. It's like a big
round mirror.

(A round...mirror. So it's hard. It seems to match
the description that Cid gave... Does Delta really
know of it?)

(That said, Zeta knew about rice cakes. So it isn't
strange that Delta, a fellow therianathrope, knows
it too. I should've considered that.)
Delta, I would like to have that kagami rice cake.
Should I show you? Can I go outside?

(She just wants to go for a walk... No, only Delta
has any clues about this. I will try believing her.)
Yes, can I ask for your help?

Okay! Right, let's get going to the Therianthrope
Shrine!

...Wait! The Therianthrope Shrine? Kagami rice cake
is there?
Yes!

The Therianthrope Shrine is some distance from here.
Once we head there we can't exactly just come back,
and if it's a shrine, then we should dress formally.
Lady Alpha, we should get going already!

If we have to go that far away, we need to prepare
for it.
But I don't care about that! Let's go, let's go!
Delta, did you not hear me?
...Eep! O-Okay...
